code: import*as api from"../api";import{AUTH}from"../constants/actionTypes";export const signin=(formData,history)=>async dispatch=>{try{let data=await api.signIn(formData);data=data.data;dispatch({type:AUTH,data});history("/");}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const signup=(formData,history)=>async dispatch=>{try{let data=await api.signUp(formData);data=data.data;dispatch({type:AUTH,data});history("/");}catch(error){console.log(error);}};export const getUserDetails=async id=>{try{const data=await api.getUserDetails(id);return data.data;}catch(error){console.log(error);}};
